reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and comfortable, with a perfect fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My perfect wedding dress!
items.body: I was apprehensive about buying a dress on Amazon for my wedding but it was everything I hoped it would be! I felt like an Angel! I did have it altered, to fit me perfectly and bustle the train! The compliments I received were more than I ever expected! I would 100% recommend buying this dress if it’s your style. I did my measurements and ordered accordingly. The alterations were to make it shorter, I’m 5’8” so I was worried about the length. I also wore a 2.7 inch heel and still had to shorten the bottom, so if you’re a tall gal, it should be long enough. I used tape to make sure the girls stayed in, but a low cut undergarment helped with keeping the boobs in place! I can’t say enough nice things about this dress! I wanna wear it again and again! Read more
items.author: Bree

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy this
items.body: Worst purchase ever. The material is not very good. Is doesn’t match with the picture 100%. Returning this item has been a complete nightmare. Idk why Amazon allows third party sellers to offer their own products here. Definitely not buying again Read more
items.author: Gabriela

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, loose fit
items.body: the quality of the dress was very nice. In most wedding dress stores I've tried on I was a size 14 so I ordered that but you can see the top was too loose and wide for me! I am 5'2 and weigh about 160. Short legs 34B bust. The bottom fit pretty nice for my butt but everything for the top would have to be taken in. I absolutely loved the bottom and the lace was very nice quality! I didn't really know how I felt about the tiny belt that is attached to it though. It doesn't serve a purpose can be adjusted and kind of falls flat. Either way, GREAT quality. Read more
items.author: Yumonstah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and wonderfully made.
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress. I only returned it because it ran super large (I wear a 14 and got a 14 and probably needed a 10) and the train was way longer than the photo made it look. I'm disabled and a long train would be really tough for me. But, the dress is amazing on. Comfortable, silky, gorgeous. All my girlfriends loved it too! Read more
items.author: Kimberley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for the price.
items.body: This dress is very great quality, more than expected! But it needed work. My local seamstress had to put a lining on the front because it was all see through lace with JUST TWO CUPS. The front was a little too low for my comfort level so she took off the lace from the back neckline and made a cover up so it was appropriate for church. I LOVED MY DRESS! It was comfortable all night. Only think I would add was a clip to take up the train when at the reception. It was a bit long when we danced and talked to people. 10/10. Read more
items.author: S. Maldonado

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: This is a beautiful dress. I’ve tried it on and it fits perfect. This was to be my reception dress. My husband and I didn’t get to do engagement photos. We’re going to make up for that and I will be wearing this dress. Read more
items.author: Danyelle Nash

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not a bargain buy, and return is a joke
items.body: Kind of how the picture looked, but not really. I took a chance and ordered this dress (the long sleeve, front/back V. The sleeves were too wide all through. The thing that bothered me most was the bra thing. It’s 2 foam discs. When I put the dress on they were so obvious. The material looks opaque until it is put on, and then it showed everything, especially the two awkward foam rounds. I took a shot in the dark, and it was a no-go for me, but may work for someone else, so I’m not saying “don’t buy it”. I’m just saying I got what one can expect from a <$100 dress. However, biggest issue was with return. The seller does not send a true shipping label as indicated in emails. They send instructions with a return address. I had to go through Customer service and explain this (it took a while because they kept assuring me I’d get a label). I had to finally send a screenshot of my “label” (didn’t know that I could send an image until this - they send you a link to upload an image). Anyway, return experience was challenging. The dress is not as pictured (in my opinion). I feel you can spend the same on a dress at department store and get something nicer. Or a site like LuLu’s. Not great value for money. Sizing seemed accurate-ish if using the seller’s size chart. Fabric weight is not as expected. The top was not made to conceal the bra discs. Comfort was fine, but material was not ideal. For me, functionality was not there. Read more
items.author: Shana

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: G-ivory, G-white, S-ivory, S-white, N-ivory, N-white, L-white, L-ivory, Q-ivory, Q-white, D-white, D-ivory, C-ivory, C-white. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
